scenario_text.value: *mumble* *mumble* Urgh, no no no no...
Yes, that’s it... Hehe... Haha... Unnngh...!
Uh...Ryo? Are you feeling okay? What’s up?
Who are you talking to? There’s nobody there.
Kew...
Seriously, Ryo, are you sure you’re okay?

*mumble* Shut up... It’s... It’s all over
anyway... It’s over for us...

Heheh, aha... That’s why... Yes... She’s
coming for me... Heheh...
(It’s no use. He won’t even look at me.)

(I hope this is just him getting flustered or
experiencing some temporary form of shock.)

(Like, what do you do when somebody gets like
this? Leave them alone? That feels wrong.)
(What should I do about Ryo?)
Leave him alone.
Force him to engage!
Leave him alone.

(I wouldn’t want to unintentionally make
things worse. I’ll just leave him alone.)

Hehe, if...if it’s all over, then...
Heeheehahaha... I... I...
(He’ll...be okay...right?)
Force him to engage.

(I can’t just leave him like this. It might
be hard, but I want to get through to him.)

Listen, Ryo, you really shouldn’t be off on
your own. Why not stay in the cafeteria?

Let go of me! We’re all screwed anyway, no
matter what we do...

That’s not true. If we all work together, I’m
sure we’ll be okay.

Besides, we’ve got Agumon, Kunemon, and the
others. They’ll help keep us safe.
You got that right!
Kewww!

No! I’m telling you, none of that’s going to
change anything!

It doesn’t matter what we do. We’re just
gonna die. And in that case, in that case...
Ryo...

Ugh, Ohhh...I hate this! I hate it, hate it,
hate it! Help me, save me...
*whimper* *sob*... Heh, heheh, heeheehahaha!

(He’s not looking at me again. I’m not sure
I’ll be able to talk with him anymore.)

It’s over, it’s all over... We’re done for,
finished, completely screwed...
Kew...

(I’m worried about Ryo, but I think I’ll
leave him to Kunemon for now.)
Why don’t we go back to the others, Agumon?
Sure...

(Ryo’s still just mumbling to himself. I’d
better check on the others.)
